DOC.brief_summary: This one-week study design test safety all-in-one body personal lubricant product in-home use .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study All-in-One Body Personal Lubricant
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , medically supervise , single-arm study evaluate safety body personal lubricant product home-use condition via clinical assessment . The study consist 2 visit . Subjects meet entrance criterion receive investigational product ( IP ) 2 subjective questionnaire at-home completion . The subject require use IP least 2 time , instruct 1-week home-use period . At end study ( visit 2 ) subject return study site , time unused IP questionnaire return final clinical assessment perform .
DOC.criteria: Normal , healthy adult stable , monogamous , ongoing heterosexual relationship current partner within protocolspecified parameter Subjects comfortable discuss sensitive topic personal hygiene , menstruation sexuality Able read understand English Voluntarily sign Informed Consent document trial explain Willing follow study procedure , include birth control requirement Any medical mental health history condition , use product , drug medication per protocol ( opinion Investigator ) might compromise participant 's safety analysis result Participation research subject different trial within timeline dictate protocol Participants relationships employment outside protocoldefined parameter
